Notes: Source document obtained through a Freedom of Information Act request to the agency.

Description: A federal judge ordered Carl Zeiss Vision, Inc. to pay $750,000 in criminal fines for repeatedly discharging untreated wastewater from its lens-manufacturing facility in Clackamas, Oregon to the Kellogg Creek Wastewater Treatment Plant.

Notes: Taken from summary listing of enforcement orders; some details (such as suspended penalties) are not available.
